title: Free Wifi in common areas
posting_body: ["Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.", 'Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.', '-24-Hour Athletic Centers Featuring Cardio, Free Weights, and Yoga Room', '-Mountain Views', '-Close to the Las Vegas Strip', '-Two Outdoor Lounges with Fireplace', '-Poolside Barbecue Grills with Seating', '-Free WiFi Access in Common Areas', '-Expansive Community Walking and Biking Path to Exploration Park', '-Living Green Community Featuring On-Site Recycling Program', '-Elevator Access in Select Buildings', '-Regular Community Events with Friendly Staff', '-EV Charging Station', '-Covered Parking Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
